texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information, visit abp.io.
texts.Infera.TestCase:00002: This building already has this warehouse.
texts.Infera.TestCase:00003: There is already room number {No} in this building.
texts.Infera.TestCase:00004: There already exists a {Name} branded product of {Size} size produced by {Manifacturer}.
texts.Infera.TestCase:00005: The specified product already exists in this warehouse.
texts.Infera.TestCase:00006: There is already a warehouse numbered {No} and named {Name} in this building.
texts.Infera.TestCase:00007: There is already an invoice with date {Date} and number{InvoiceNo}.
